Message: All data conversion/parsing of Table parameters is now performed by ERPConnect instead of the classic RFC SDK.
Updated logic to set MaxLength property for result data tables in XtractQL.
Reverted changes from 4.17.10
Fix for receiving INT in table parameters from big endian systems (classic RFC)
Disabled code signing for ERPConnect DLLs (signature check leads to high latency in some cases)
Temporarily re-added R3Connection.IsBusy (deprecated, will be removed again)
R3Connection.Close() does not throw exceptions anymore (SOAP)
ERPConnect DLLs are signed now
Added support for SAP Codepage 6300 (Eurojapan)
Added support for SAP Release 7.4
Refactored tree browser into user control
New hierarchy look-up
New query look-up and metada retrieval
Updated to 4.17.13.0
Workaround for variable usage with Bex mode under BW release 7.4
Updated XQLDataReader logic in XtractQL.
Implemented query selection parameters for look-up
Fix for issues with S init with certain OLTP sources: Setting the I_INITSIMU param to X when calling RSA1_OLTPSOURCE_GET_SELECTIONS
Updated logic to set MaxLength property for result data tables in XtractQL.
Fixed several source analysis issues which were detected by new StyleCop version (mostly documentation typos)
Updated StyleCop to 4.7.49.0
Added new API methods for query lookup & metadata retrieval
Optimized initial loading time of tree browser
Optimized table lookup and filtering in tree browser
Added tree browser for table lookup
Updated to 4.17.7.0
Updated XtractQL to support KernelRules code analysis.
